text: Television New Zealand (), more commonly known as TVNZ, is a free-to-air public broadcasting television network that is broadcast throughout New Zealand and parts of the Pacific region. TVNZ was created in February 1980. About 90% of TVNZ's revenue is from commercial activity (such as advertising and merchandising). , IAB New Zealand website ==Programing == * Clifford the Big Red Dog (2000) * Gleam Gamblers (2014) ==References== Category:20th- century establishments in New Zealand Category:Television networks Category:1980 establishments in Oceania Category:Companies of New Zealand
title: TVNZ
